## Plugin\_2.registerEditorSuggest() method

Register an EditorSuggest which can provide live suggestions while the user is typing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerEditorSuggest(editorSuggest: EditorSuggest<any>): void;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
